cells.data:
• clientX The Touch.clientX read-only property returns the X coordinate of the touch point relative to the viewport, not including any scroll offset.（相对于当前元素界面的坐标）
  • clientY The Touch.clientY read-only property returns the Y coordinate of the touch point relative to the browser's viewport, not including any scroll offset.
  • pageX The Touch.pageX read-only property returns the X coordinate of the touch point relative to the viewport, including any scroll offset. (兼容性差)
  • pageY The Touch.pageY read-only property returns the Y coordinate of the touch point relative to the viewport, including any scroll offset. (兼容性差)
  • screenX Returns the X coordinate of the touch point relative to the screen, not including any scroll offset.
  • screenY Returns the Y coordinate of the touch point relative to the screen, not including any scroll offset.
